page.title: 07SCHOOLS IN CHARD
page.content: In the town there are a number of playgroups for the pre- school children, they are at Millfield, Holyrood School, Methodist Church, Avishayes. Millfield Playgroup is celebrating its 18th Birthday this year. There are two Primary Schools at Avishayes, and Manor Court - which take children from 4 - 11 years of age. The Secondary School is Holyrood School which is split into two sites 1.The Lower School 11 - 13 at Furnham 2.The Upper School 13 - 18 at Zembard. We start School at 8:30am and end School at 2:55pm and at the end of one day of the week it is compulsary to have a Flexi Hour where you can choose which subject you want for example:- Tennis,Photography,Gymnastics, _ Trampolining,Candle Making and Classical Guitar.
